title: [Prerequisites](/node-operators/operators/offboarding/prerequisites){target=_blank}
content: Before starting to offboard your Tanssi node, check the prerequisites.

title: [Opt Out from Tanssi (Required)](/node-operators/operators/offboarding/opt-out-from-tanssi){target=_blank}
content: Opt out from the Tanssi network on Ethereum.

title: [Vault Opt out (Optional)](/node-operators/operators/offboarding/vault-opt-out){target=_blank}
content: This step is optional and only necessary if you want to remove your association with the vault completely. Skipping this step won't affect your ability to rejoin the network in the future
